name: Dodge The f-ing meteors and that's it #2!
name_original: Dodge The f-ing meteors and that's it #2!
description:
Hello fellow Humans!

I am CactusCoder131, the developer of this failure, and actually, this is a sequel to the please-don't-play-my-30-minutes-game game! What I forgot: press escape to pause the game, if you need a break. And I bet you can't beat my 10000 highscore!
